Annotation.Literal:
The Kinect Ontology September 2013
Díaz Rodríguez, N., Wikström, R., Lilius, J., Cuéllar, M.P., and Delgado Calvo-Flores, M.
Department of Information Technologies, Åbo Akademi University, Turku (Finland) Department of Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence, University of Granada (Spain)
____________________________________________________________________________

AnnotationAssertion.Literal: We calculate the orientation of the bones based on the positions of the joints returned by the skeletal tracking pipeline.
This considers the center of the skeleton graph to be the Hip Center bone joint. The extremities are considered branches in a tree.
